content.text:
# Revolutionary Youth Alliance

Revolutionary Youth Alliance ( - AJR) is a  Trotskyist political youth movement in Brazil, being a faction of the Workers' Cause Party (PCO). AJR publishes Juventude Revolucionária and works within the National Students Union (UNE).[http://www.vermelho.org.br/diario/2005/0704/0704_conune-reeleicao.asp Diário Vermelho .::: Termina 49º Congresso da UNE com reeleição do presidente ::] AJR also takes part in student council elections.
